  • Long distance movers USA
Long Distance Movers USA

Long Distance Moving can take life anywhere you need to go! Capable of handling moves that range from cross-country travels all the way down state line. Innovative solutions are fully customizable and their professional movers will ensure every detail is considered during this process.

Project link:

https://www.ld-movers.com/

Task

Create a modern, user-friendly website for a top moving company with an individual design and a mobile version. And take into account the client's corporate identity and all design requirements.

Solution

We have designed and programmed a website that meets all the wishes of the client. It looks great, displays without problems on all modern devices and is easy to use. See for yourself!

Site Pages

All the necessary pages: services, locations listed and on the map, text and video reviews, contacts and more.

Adaptability

For mobile devices

Since most modern users visit websites on smartphones, we have paid close attention to adapting the site for mobiles. All pages and screens have been designed to be used on any device.

All Screens

Сделали дизайн, сверстали и запрограммировали под все устройства.

Attention to Detail

We showed all the necessary nuances, guidance, drop-down lists, pop-ups and animations.

Thanks for watching!

Использованные технологии
Наша команда успешно работает с данными системами управления (CMS) и фреймворками, как для поддержки сайтов, так и для их комплексного администрирования.
